review: Experienced and very humble person, nice behaviour. Gives confidence to the patients. Over all nice person.

I came to visit for my father, he already had a stent operation in past and recently did an angiogram for recheck. We came for suggestion whether to proceed with the medicine or go for bypass with the current scenario....the doctor was very friendly and explained us that bypass is not at all required now and suggested yo continue the meds. 

I would recommend anyone to visit here as we were very happy with the way the doctor explained everything and gave us confidence ☺️..

I had consulted the doctor and it was for health concern. ****** *** ***** I am satisfied with the treatment given. I can recommend doctor to my family or friends. I had heart related issue. I am good now. There was not much waiting time in the hospital. Medicine was prescribed by the doctor. Medical tests was also done. Hospitality was good. Normal diet was suggested by doctor.

I had been to hospital and it was for high cholesterol issue. ****** *** ***** Medicine was prescribed by the doctor. He told to follow medicines for 6 months. I am satisfied with the treatment given.  I can recommend doctor to my family or friends. Waiting time was more than 30 minutes but it was manageable. I am good now.

I visited the doctor as the patient was having heart related issue but doctor told  it was not heart issue , it was high BP issue . waiting time was more like 2 hours. He spoke well but I was not satisfied . I can recommend the doctor for initial stage. Majorly waiting time for more. .

My mother admitted  four times in AMRI - Salt lake under Dr.SRC in critical condition . In every occession he treated very seriously and relief my mother from the crisis. We are really very much satisfied about his treatment and way handling the patient at critical condition . Even today my mother got  discharged from the hospital . She is 91years of age now. Treating  of a patient at this age is not an easy matter. Apart from the treatment he is also a very good human being. Hope AMRI - Salt lake got a very good ****** **** * **** human being . They should retain him with all cares and assign him with full authority in respect to medical issues related to cardiac department.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Good. I may again consult him, if any problem arises regarding my wife's health. Happy with his advice.
*** ******** *** ********* ********* ** **** ***** After treatment I am feeling better than previously.  He is a very well behaved and friendly.

I had been to the hospital and it was for myself. I had fever. The treatment was fine. Medicine was prescribed by the doctor.  I am satisfied with the treatment given. I am good now. Waiting time was not much.

My mother had health issue related to cardio so visited the hospital. Doctor was very nice and good. He was able to remember me when I visited for the second time, he was gentle. He prescribed some pressure medicines to my mother. I am satisfied with the treatment given. I can recommend doctor to my family or friends. Waiting time was normal. Hospitality was good.
Experienced and very humble person, nice behaviour. Gives confidence to the patients. Over all nice person.
